thread.title: A Gem in London!
thread.title_full: A Gem in London! - Review of The Z Hotel Piccadilly, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: kgreenbrg
title: A Gem in London!
text:
I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here. As the previous reviews have stated, the rooms are TINY. If you are able to get past that, (and wont be staying extended periods of time in your room) this hotel is amazing. The location is fantastic, 5ish minute walk to the Picadilly Tube stop off the Piccadily line which is "tourist" London. It is located in an alley way looking street, which is great because there is no traffic/bar/etc noise outside your window at night.
We were able to check in early which was great, and they have free cheese and wine daily. Hotel staff was great and helped us figure out how to get to the airport, booking us a car for our 4am flight
We walked EVERYWHERE which was such a plus.
Room Tip: We were on the first floor, and the window faced a building which we didnt mind, but if you do, ask... See more room tips
